column1: '''The Burnings of the Westfold''' is the fifth scene of ''[[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers]]'' and the sixth scene of [[The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers (extended edition)
column2: ''The Lord of the Rings: The Two Towers'' (extended edition)]]. This scene was extended in the latter edition.
